import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Remove issues from models (bulk)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/issues/for/models/link/remove"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Bulk removes model-issue associations using a list of ModelIssue entries. Use this to clean up many links at once, such as when retiring an issue or deprecating a model.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ModelIssue entries** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/issues/for/models/link](/docs/api/model-issues/search-model-issues) to retrieve the current ModelIssue objects to remove.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for the links to remove and collect their ModelIssue data.
2. [POST /api/v1.0/issues/for/models/link/remove](/docs/api/model-issues/remove-issues-from-models) with the array of ModelIssue entries.
3. Re-run the search to confirm the links are removed.

**Minimal Required Fields**: ModelIssueId for each entry.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Request body for endpoints that accept an array of ModelIssue objects. Used by add and remove model issue endpoints.","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true},"ModelIssueId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"Scope":{"type":"string","enum":["Global","Site","Personal","GlobalOnly","Aggregate"]},"IssueId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"ModelId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"Apps":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"AppId":{"type":"string"},"ModelIssueId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"NameOverride":{"type":"string","nullable":true}},"example":{"AppId":"google-admin","ModelIssueId":"c3d4e5f6-a7b8-9012-c3d4-e5f6a7b89012","NameOverride":"Chromebook Hardware Issue"},"title":"AppModelIssue"},"nullable":true}},"example":{"SiteId":"e5f6a7b8-c9d0-1234-e5f6-a7b8c9d01234","ModelIssueId":"c3d4e5f6-a7b8-9012-c3d4-e5f6a7b89012","Scope":"Global","IssueId":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-a1b2-c3d4e5f67890","ModelId":"d4e5f6a7-b8c9-0123-d4e5-f6a7b8c90123"},"title":"ModelIssue"},"title":"ModelIssueArrayRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
